title: [Large-scale] Virtual Reality-based Intercultural Communication Competency (ICC) Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Ability to Use Simple Digital Tools
context.additional_context: VR technology-enhanced intercultural collaboration simulations and generative activities for practicing professionals to strengthen Intercultural Communicative Competence (ICC)

learning_goals: Learners can apply appropriate communication strategies with over 80% accuracy when collaborating with peers from different cultural contexts to solve math problems in VR environments.
Learners create two or more culturally contextualized virtual scenarios using generative AI and revise them by at least 70% based on peer feedback.
Learners can improve their cultural sensitivity index by 30% or more compared to baseline levels through VR-based role-play assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
